tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a collective name for a flock (of sheep or goats); also figuratively (of men)
tokens.translation: a collective name for a flock (of sheep or goats); also figuratively (of men)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a beeve or an animal of the ox family of either gender (as used for plowing); collectively, a herd

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, vehemence, i.e. (with or without preposition) vehemently; by implication, wholly, speedily, etc. (often with other words as an intensive or superlative; especially when repeated)
